rows.label: qev051506_MSG0001
rows.name:
I did not think I would have the opportunity of seeing
you here again, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ever since the incident at the Biahno Lake water-
purification plant, I have been working with my
Ma-non friend here, Veven, to protect it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0003
rows.name:
Together, we have been endeavoring to build
autosentries of higher specifications.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0004
rows.name:
We thought the Gauntlet would be a fine place to test
our latest model, you see? And then we discovered
we were matched up with with YOU![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0005
rows.name:
This should hopefully be fun, shouldn't it? Between the
science I learned from the professor and the tech of Mr.
Insect here, I think this autosentry might be...perfect?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0006
rows.name:
This machine is most likely invincible!
...Er, probably?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0007
rows.name:
Forgive me if this sounds rude, but having assessed
your latest combat data, the probability of our machine
winning exceeds 98 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051506_MSG0008
rows.name:
I fear this will be a terribly one-sided test run,
but we greatly appreciate you contributing further
data to the project.[ST:wait ]
